page.title: 02MORDIFORD - ENVIRONMENT 2
page.content: In terms of appearance our D-Block is rural in character and partially covered in woodland (25%), including part of Haugh Wood and Bear's Wood. Mordiford is a small nucleated settlement enjoying a close and friendly atmosphere. The overall impression is of a settlement that blends in well with its natural surroundings. The River Lugg flows N-S through the West side of the D-Block. On its course it flows near Hampton Meadow and through Longworth and Mordiford. As Hereford is famous for its cider one would expect there to be a number of orchards in our D-Block and indeed these include a very large cider apple producing unit at Prospect Farm.
